content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day September 23, 2020 SendGrid  Mailchimp Phishing Attacks How Scammers Leverage Email Delivery Services To Their Advantage September 23, 2020 Lately, among the myriad phishing attacks we observe and detect via Cyren Inbox Security, attacks that are distributed via email delivery services like SendGrid, MailChimp, and MailJet are increasingly common.
